code: export var setStateToPromt=function setStateToPromt(currentElement,boolean){return{type:"SET_STATE_TO_PROMT",payload:{currentElement:currentElement,boolean:boolean}};};export var setLanguage=function setLanguage(lang){return{type:"SET_LANGUAGE",payload:{lang:lang}};};export var setMediaQuery=function setMediaQuery(size){return{type:"SET_MEDIA_QUERY",payload:{size:size}};};
